pr_title: Fix NPE when reading structs with a newly added subfield

timeline.bodyText: @bhhari What happens if fieldOutputType is empty?
timeline.author: mbasmanova

replies.bodyText: We handle it in checkMissingFieldFilters. The outType is empty only in this case
replies.author: bhhari

replies.bodyText: fieldOutType can not be null, as the nestedStream is null only because we have the field from schema and missing from data
replies.author: bhhari
mbasmanova

timeline.message:
Handle schema evolution for Structs
If a nestedStream is missing for a field in the schema create a MissingFieldStreamReader

timeline.author: mbasmanova

timeline.message: Fix NPE when reading structs with a newly added subfield
Fix NPE when reading structs with a newly added subfield
Fix NPE when reading structs with a newly added subfield
